          <title>
            <string language="fi">Valmiin työn kumoaminen</string>
            <string language="en">Removal of ready work</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbau der betriebsbereiten Arbeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déplacement de travail prêt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Remoção do trabalho pronto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La rimozione di aspetta il lavoro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αφαίρεση αναμένει την εργασία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Retiro del trabajo listo</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään yksiosaisessa valumuotissa tehdyn valmiin savityön kumominen muotista.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows the removal of the ceramic work completed in the one-section pottery mould.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ceramic</string>
            <string language="en">pottery</string>
            <string language="en">removal</string>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt den Abbau der keramischen 
Arbeit, die in der Einkapitel Tonwarenform durchgeführt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre le déplacement des travaux en 
céramique terminés dans le moule de poterie d'un-section.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra a remoção do trabalho 
cerâmico terminado no molde da cerâmica da um-seção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra la rimozione dei lavori di
ceramica ultimati nella muffa delle terraglie della un-sezione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο εμφανίζει την αφαίρεση της κεραμικής 
εργασίας που ολοκληρώνεται στη φόρμα αγγειοπλαστικής 
ένας-τμημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra el retiro del trabajo de 
cerámica terminado en el molde de la cerámica de la uno-seccio'n.</string>
          </description>
